code: import{useState}from'react';import Todo from'./Todo';import'./todoApp.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TodoApp(){const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);function handleChange(e){const value=e.target.value;setTitle(value);}function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(title.trim()!==""){const newTodo={id:crypto.randomUUID(),title:title,completed:false};const temp=[...todos];temp.unshift(newTodo);setTodos(temp);setTitle(' ');}}function handleUpdate(id,value){const temp=[...todos];const item=temp.find(item=>item.id===id);item.title=value;setTodos(temp);}function handleDelete(id){const temp=todos.filter(item=>item.id!==id);setTodos(temp);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todoContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"todoContainerForm",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:handleChange,className:"todoInput",value:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onClick:handleSubmit,type:"submit",value:" Create to do",className:"buttonCreate"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todosContainer",children:todos.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Todo,{item:item,onUpdate:handleUpdate,onDelete:handleDelete},item.id))})]});}
